Class ScopedContextDataProvider

java.lang.Object
org.apache.logging.log4j.core.impl.ScopedContextDataProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContextDataProvider
public class ScopedContextDataProvider extends Object implements ContextDataProvider
ContextDataProvider for Map<String, String> data.
Since:
2.24.0

    • get

      public String get(String key)
      Description copied from interface: ContextDataProvider
      Returns the key for a value from the context data.
      Specified by:
      get in interface ContextDataProvider
      Parameters:
      key - the key to locate.
      Returns:
      the value or null if it is not found.

    • supplyContextData

      public Map<String,String> supplyContextData()
      Description copied from interface: ContextDataProvider
      Returns a Map containing context data to be injected into the event or null if no context data is to be added.

      Thread-safety note: The returned object can safely be passed off to another thread: future changes in the underlying context data will not be reflected in the returned object.

      Specified by:
      supplyContextData in interface ContextDataProvider
      Returns:
      A Map containing the context data or null.

    • size

      Specified by:

      Returns:
      the number of items in the context.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
